TextView.android:text: Keywords and taxonomy are obtained from tweets as and when each tweet is seen using extraction API from AlchemyAPI

Based on user input - 
1. user scrolls through (skipped),
2. user clicks and reads the tweet or article (interested),
3. user clicks 'cross' to say he does not like the tweet.
keywords and taxonomy associated with tweets are scored with heuristic
Next time tweet with keywords available in DB are seen, tweet is given a score. If the score is above a threshold, it is categorized as relevant.
